channel.title: Tom should get demoted
channel.description:
I'm serious about thread title but I have a different suggestion that I'm being serious about.
Your years of service displayed on the postbit. Like since I'm registered for three years, when I make post somewhere under my name it could say "three years of service". or "two years of service" etc etc...

Are you that retarded that you can’t tell when somebody is directly addressing you? Anti-social phaggot.

Anti-Social, I have a life it isn’t dedicated to these forums and I don’t live in my mommy’s basement like you, as soon as you faggot ass grows up maybe you’ll understand… till then shut up

Your life on Runescape must be really promising.

[/quote]
I don’t play Runescape

Me?

Are you that retarded that you can’t tell when somebody is directly addressing you? Anti-social phaggot.

Anti-Social, I have a life it isn’t dedicated to these forums and I don’t live in my mommy’s basement like you, as soon as you faggot ass grows up maybe you’ll understand… till then shut up

Your grammar sucks balls.

item.title: Tom should get demoted
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:13, topic:543180”]and thus this topic has already turned into “how long were you registered” topic

I don’t see a need for the postbit addition, especially saying “years of service” because only a few people have actually provided service to this community. it just seems like that person matters more than others, but it has not significant value.

like I saw earlier. user was registered in 06 and has one post, and it was posted today.

why should it say “8 years of service” when they’ve done nothing?

post count was removed from post bit for reasons, and I could see the same thing happening to this if it were to be added[/quote]
shut up faggot being on the forum and +1ing the memberlist is enough to get it you vainy dick fgt.

Read full topic
